code: import React,{useState}from'react';import MemberItem from'./MemberItem';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MemberList(_ref){let{members,setMembers}=_ref;const[newMember,setNewMember]=useState('');const addMember=()=>{if(newMember.trim()){setMembers([...members,newMember]);setNewMember('');}};const deleteMember=index=>{setMembers(members.filter((_,i)=>i!==index));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"member-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Members"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"requires username",value:newMember,onChange:e=>setNewMember(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addMember,children:"Add Member"}),members.map((member,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MemberItem,{member:member,onDelete:()=>deleteMember(index)},index))]});}export default MemberList;
